vote.title: Authorize a two-year service contract, with three one-year renewal options, for lead based paint remediation services to include lead hazard reduction, repairs, and remodeling for the Department of Housing and Neighborhood Revitalization - REKJ Builders, LLC, most advantageous proposer of two - Not to exceed $1,400,000 - Financing:  Lead Hazard Control and Healthy Homes Grant Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a two-year service contract, with three one-year renewal options, for lead based paint remediation services to include lead hazard reduction, repairs, and remodeling for the Department of Housing and Neighborhood Revitalization - REKJ Builders, LLC, most advantageous proposer of two - Not to exceed $1,400,000 - Financing:  Lead Hazard Control and Healthy Homes Grant Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
